title: Read X / Tweets
description: Search tweets, analyze profiles, and track trending topics on X (formerly Twitter)
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: search_tweets
commands.description: Search for tweets matching a query

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (supports Twitter search operators like from:, to:, #hashtag)

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of tweets to return

returns.description: Array of tweet objects with author, text, engagement metrics, timestamp, and media

commands.name: analyze_profile
commands.description: Analyze a Twitter/X user profile and recent activity

returns.description: Profile analysis with bio, follower count, posting frequency, top topics, sentiment breakdown, and influence score

commands.name: track_topic
commands.description: Monitor a topic or hashtag for new tweets over a time period

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topic, hashtag, or keyword to track

parameters.name: duration_hours
parameters.description: How many hours to track (monitoring window)

returns.description: Tracking report with tweet volume over time, top authors, sentiment trend, and key tweets
